description: Housed in a delightful 19C house facing the Naviglio del Brenta, this restaurant has been fully renovated to offer a welcoming space in which fish and seafood reign supreme. Prepared wherever possible from local fish, the dishes served here are simple, traditional and either from the Veneto or elsewhere in Italy.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
